query.statement: SELECT A.CUST_CD, A.CUST_NM, SUM(A.AR_AMT) AR_AMT, NVL((SELECT SUM(RECEIVE_AMT) FROM SLA_AR_RECEIVE_DETAIL RD WHERE RD.RECD_STATUS='L'),0) RECEIVE_AMT, (SUM(NVL(A.AR_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL((SELECT SUM(RECEIVE_AMT) FROM SLA_AR_RECEIVE_DETAIL RD WHERE RD.AR_NUM=A.AR_NUM AND RD.RECD_STATUS='L'),0))) AS AR_BAL_AMT FROM SLA_AR_MST A, HLDC_SC_DEPT_V C WHERE A.CC_CD = C.CC_CD(+) AND A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# --AND A.OCCUR_DATE <= #DATEFR# AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#DATEFR#||'01') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE((#DATETO#||'01'),'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY A.CUST_CD, A.CUST_NM
